channel.title: [REQ]Enterprise logo
channel.description:
Hi there! I'm currently taking a business course and we're supposed to build a virtual business enterprise from scratch. I have a basic idea in my mind, but the I'm having trouble with the logo since I can barely use paint, let alone photoshop.
The enterprise is a retro style cafeteria (1960s) and the logo should, in my opinion, resemble the period. I decided to go with the name JukeBOX for the name of the cafeteria, which is what the logo should include (yes, BOX capitalized). I'd appreciate it if someone could make me a logo with the aforementioned details, and you can even suggest name ideas that you think might be better for the enterprise.
P.S. I do understand that there's a section for graphic requests, but I decided to post it here so as to not spread it, even though the whole concept is over-used and old. And most people who use the graphics section also have access to this section, too.
Thanks.

item.title: [REQ]Enterprise logo
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If it isn’t immediately obvious, he asked for it in here because this forum is private (and thus beyond the access capabilities of Joe Lecturer).

Anyway, I don’t think much weight would be associated with something so trivial. If you aren’t sure then ask them for a marking sheet which will show you where and for what the marks are allocated.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Enterprise logo
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Heres the result of my brainstorming, hopefully this will give you ideas or make you decide what you dont like. I tried to incorporate some 1960s symbols and colors while also keeping it simple.

The ‘e’ has very bad quality, but if you like the idea ill touch it up.

It sucks really, im not a PS artist but i get by with a few things.

Read full topic
